00036 void MAsymRateHists::BookHists(string sid)
00037 {
00038    fDir->cd();
00039 
00040    for (UInt_t i=0; i!=N_POLARIMETERS; i++) {
00041       for (BeamEnergySetIter iBE=gRunConfig.fBeamEnergies.begin(); iBE!=gRunConfig.fBeamEnergies.end(); ++iBE) {
00042          BookHistsPolarimeter((EPolarimeterId) i, *iBE);
00043       }
00044    }
00045 }

00049 void MAsymRateHists::BookHistsPolarimeter(EPolarimeterId polId, EBeamEnergy beamE)
00050 {
00051    char hName[256];
00052    //char hTitle[256];
00053    string  strPolId = RunConfig::AsString(polId);
00054    string  strBeamE = RunConfig::AsString(beamE);
00055    Color_t color    = RunConfig::AsColor(polId);
00056 
00057    // Dynamic limits
00058    Int_t t0Lo   = -30;
00059    Int_t t0Hi   = 30;
00060    Int_t dlLo   = 30;
00061    Int_t dlHi   = 70;
00062    Int_t hiRate = 55;
00063 
00064    if (beamE == 250) {
00065       if (polId == kB1U || polId == kY2U) { t0Lo = -10; t0Hi = 5; }
00066       if (polId == kB2D || polId == kY1D) { t0Lo = -20; t0Hi = 5; }
00067 
00068       //if (polId == kB2D) { dlLo = 40; dlHi = 60; }
00069       hiRate = 55;
00070 
00071    } else if (beamE == 24) {
00072       if (polId == kB1U || polId == kY2U) { t0Lo = -20; t0Hi = 0; }
00073       if (polId == kB2D || polId == kY1D) { t0Lo = -30; t0Hi = 0; }
00074 
00075       //if (polId == kY1D) { dlLo = 60; dlHi = 80; }
00076       hiRate = 22;
00077    }
00078 
00079    // Rate
00080    sprintf(hName, "grMaxRateVsMeas");
00081    TGraphErrors *grMaxRateVsMeas = new TGraphErrors();
00082    grMaxRateVsMeas->SetName(hName);
00083    grMaxRateVsMeas->SetMarkerStyle(kFullCircle);
00084    grMaxRateVsMeas->SetMarkerSize(1);
00085    grMaxRateVsMeas->SetMarkerColor(color);
00086 
00087    sprintf(hName, "hMaxRateVsMeas_%s_%s", strPolId.c_str(), strBeamE.c_str());
00088    o[hName] = new TH2F(hName, hName, 1, 14900, 15500, 1, 0, hiRate);
00089    ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetTitle(";Measurement;Max Rate, MHz;");
00090    ((TH1*) o[hName])->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grMaxRateVsMeas, "p");
00091 
00092    // t0
00093    TGraphErrors *grT0VsMaxRate = new TGraphErrors();
00094    grT0VsMaxRate->SetName("grT0VsMaxRate");
00095    grT0VsMaxRate->SetMarkerStyle(kFullCircle);
00096    grT0VsMaxRate->SetMarkerSize(1);
00097    grT0VsMaxRate->SetMarkerColor(color);
00098 
00099    sprintf(hName, "hT0VsMaxRate_%s_%s", strPolId.c_str(), strBeamE.c_str());
00100    o[hName] = new TH2F(hName, hName, 1, 0, hiRate, 1, t0Lo, t0Hi);
00101    ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetTitle(";Max Rate, MHz;t_{0};");
00102    ((TH1*) o[hName])->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grT0VsMaxRate, "p");
00103 
00104    // DL
00105    TGraphErrors *grDLVsMaxRate = new TGraphErrors();
00106    grDLVsMaxRate->SetName("grDLVsMaxRate");
00107    grDLVsMaxRate->SetMarkerStyle(kFullCircle);
00108    grDLVsMaxRate->SetMarkerSize(1);
00109    grDLVsMaxRate->SetMarkerColor(color);
00110 
00111    sprintf(hName, "hDLVsMaxRate_%s_%s", strPolId.c_str(), strBeamE.c_str());
00112    o[hName] = new TH2F(hName, hName, 1, 0, hiRate, 1, dlLo, dlHi);
00113    ((TH1*) o[hName])->SetTitle(";Max Rate, MHz;Dead Layer #mug/cm^{2};");
00114    ((TH1*) o[hName])->GetListOfFunctions()->Add(grDLVsMaxRate, "p");
00115 
00116 }

00120 void MAsymRateHists::Fill(const EventConfig &rc)
00121 {
00122    Double_t runId            = rc.fMeasInfo->RUNID;
00123    UInt_t   beamEnergy       = (UInt_t) (rc.fMeasInfo->GetBeamEnergy() + 0.5);
00124    Short_t  polId            = rc.fMeasInfo->fPolId;
00125    //Short_t  targetId         = rc.fMseMeasInfoX->target_id;
00126    //Char_t   targetOrient     = rc.fMseMeasInfoX->target_orient[0];
00127    //Float_t  ana_power        = rc.fAnaMeasResult->A_N[1];
00128    //Float_t  asymmetry        = rc.fAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[0] * rc.fAnaMeasResult->A_N[1];
00129    //Float_t  asymmetryErr     = rc.fAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[1] * rc.fAnaMeasResult->A_N[1];
00130    //Float_t  polarization     = rc.fAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[0] * 100.;
00131    //Float_t  polarizationErr  = rc.fAnaMeasResult->sinphi[0].P[1] * 100.;
00132    //Float_t  profileRatio     = rc.fAnaMeasResult->fIntensPolarR;
00133    //Float_t  profileRatioErr  = rc.fAnaMeasResult->fIntensPolarRErr;
00134    Float_t  max_rate         = rc.fAnaMeasResult->max_rate;
00135    Float_t  tzero            = rc.fCalibrator->GetChannelCalib(0).fT0Coef;
00136    Float_t  tzeroErr         = rc.fCalibrator->GetChannelCalib(0).fT0CoefErr;
00137    Float_t  dl               = rc.fCalibrator->GetChannelCalib(0).fDLWidth;
00138    Float_t  dlErr            = rc.fCalibrator->GetChannelCalib(0).fDLWidthErr;
00139 
00140    // XXX
00141    //if (polId == 3 && dl < 45) cout << "XXX DL: " << dl << endl;
00142    //
00143 
00144    if (gRunConfig.fBeamEnergies.find((EBeamEnergy) beamEnergy) == gRunConfig.fBeamEnergies.end())
00145       return;
00146 
00147    //printf("XXX: %8.3f, %3d, %f, %f, %f, %f, %f\n", runId, 
00148    //   beamEnergy, asymmetry, asymmetryErr, ana_power, polarization,
00149    //   polarizationErr);
00150 
00151    char hName[256];
00152 
00153    string strPolId = RunConfig::AsString((EPolarimeterId) polId);
00154    string strBeamE = RunConfig::AsString((EBeamEnergy) beamEnergy);
00155 
00156    TGraphErrors *graphErrs = 0;
00157    TGraph       *graph = 0;
00158 
00159    // Rate
00160    sprintf(hName, "hMaxRateVsMeas_%s_%s", strPolId.c_str(), strBeamE.c_str());
00161    graph = (TGraph*) ((TH1*) o[hName])->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject("grMaxRateVsMeas");
00162    graph->SetPoint(graph->GetN(), runId, max_rate);
00163 
00164    // t0
00165    sprintf(hName, "hT0VsMaxRate_%s_%s", strPolId.c_str(), strBeamE.c_str());
00166    graphErrs = (TGraphErrors*) ((TH1*) o[hName])->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject("grT0VsMaxRate");
00167    graphErrs->SetPoint(graphErrs->GetN(), max_rate, tzero);
00168    graphErrs->SetPointError(graphErrs->GetN(), 0, tzeroErr);
00169 
00170    // Dead layer
00171    sprintf(hName, "hDLVsMaxRate_%s_%s", strPolId.c_str(), strBeamE.c_str());
00172    graphErrs = (TGraphErrors*) ((TH1*) o[hName])->GetListOfFunctions()->FindObject("grDLVsMaxRate");
00173    graphErrs->SetPoint(graphErrs->GetN(), max_rate, dl);
00174    graphErrs->SetPointError(graphErrs->GetN(), 0, dlErr);
00175 }
